sub_cat.desc: Paracetamol 650 MG Tablet is the most widely used over-the-counter (OTC) medication. It is used for the treatment of fever.

Pan-D Capsule PR is a prescription medicine used to treat gastroesophageal reflux disease (Acid reflux) and peptic ulcer disease by relieving the symptoms of acidity such as indigestion, heartburn, stomach pain, or irritation.
Telvas-CT 40 Tablet contains two medicines, both of which help to control high blood pressure. Lowering blood pressure helps to reduce your risk of having a heart attack or a stroke in the future.

Gluconorm-G 3 Forte Tablet PR belongs to a category of medicines known as anti-diabetic drugs. It is a combination of two medicines used to treat type 2 diabetes mellitus in adults. It helps control blood sugar levels in people with diabetes.

Pioz 15 Tablet is a medicine used to treat type 2 diabetes mellitus in adults. It helps control blood sugar levels in people with diabetes. This helps to prevent serious complications of diabetes like kidney damage and blindness.
Gabantin-NT Tablet is a combination medicine used for the treatment of neuropathic pain. This medicine decreases the pain by stopping the movement of pain signals to the brain.
Layered prevention strategies — like staying up to date on vaccines and wearing masks — can help prevent severe illness and reduce the potential for strain on the healthcare system.
Hand sanitizers also may not remove harmful chemicals, such as pesticides and heavy metals like lead.
A thermometer is a device that enables you to measure your temperature or temperature gradient.
A microscope is an instrument that makes an enlarged image of a small object, thus revealing details too small to be seen by the unaided eye.
Horlicks, made from Milk, Wheat and 27 vital nutrients, helps children become taller, stronger and sharper. Let them continue to amaze you with their growth!
